description: This file defines a Zustand store for managing global application state in a frontend JavaScript project. It includes state slices for team info, quiz details, saved activities, feedback, plans, analytics, persona, and time ranges, along with corresponding setter methods.

methods.name: setTeam
methods.description: Updates the team state with provided team properties.

methods.name: setQuiz
methods.description: Updates the quiz state with provided quiz properties.

methods.name: saveRecommendation
methods.description: Adds a recommendation item to the saved list if it is not already present.

methods.name: giveFeedback
methods.description: Appends user feedback to the feedback array with a timestamp and a unique id.

methods.name: clearRecommendations
methods.description: Clears the recommendations (currently resets state, placeholder).

methods.name: setPlan
methods.description: Updates the plan state with new plan details.

methods.name: setTimeRange
methods.description: Sets the current time range filter.
